attributes.action: pictures of the candidate with name on in polling stations
attributes.additional_details: reason how many people do you know by face and not name and also see whos working in your community
attributes.background: on a seperate board away from the polling booths put a board with the people who are standing to be local councillors pictures on with the name underneath

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure if you'd like this to be provided for all elections, or just for local authority elections 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
